item.title: The fastest way to share your notebooks - announcing NotebookSharing.space
item.description: Sharing notebooks is harder than it should be. You are working on a notebook (in Jupyter, RStudio, Visual Studio Code, whatever), and want to share it quickly with someone. Maybe you want some feedback, or you’re demonstrating a technique, or there is a cool result you want to quickly show someone. A million reasons to want to quickly share a notebook, but unfortunately there isn’t a quick enough and easy enough solution right now.
